extendedInfo.description: âHouse Pest is a cute app that is filled to the brim with high quality content.â â Family Friendly GamingMeet Fiasco the Catâ¢. Your new feline friend is curious, adorable and a tad mischievous, which means your living room could become a complete wreck! Race the clock to fix Fiascoâs latest disaster before your nosy neighbor arrives!Want more Fiasco? This cat really makes a scene in the full version, which includes 6 additional rooms, 45 total games, and 2 difficulty levels. These exciting challenges and hilarious hijinks await for only $2.99!Discover a new set of games in every room - piano tuning, bubble popping, feather catching, picture puzzling, cake decorating, hallway bowling, mouse chasing and much more. Keep cleaning until you earn all 30 achievements including âSlappy Catâ, âMad Hatterâ and âGolden Gooseâ!Already a fan of the game?Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/2KPlay

reviews.title: Love this kitty!
reviews.comment: Very simplistic games, but the whole fun here is watching the graphics of the cat doing his mischief--very realistic and totally cute to watch!  The creator of this game is definitely a cat owner!
reviews.author: Cindy Rutherford

reviews.title: Good but costly
reviews.comment: The game is goooood for cat lovers! But sad that you can play it completely whennyou buy it. Sad :c

reviews.comment: It is really fun but the only thing that i have a promble is how do you get the full verison\tBut other than that it is great

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This game is fun and entertaining for everyone but I find it perfect for teaching FineMotor Skills to my daughter who has Cerebral Palsy. I believe all  Occupational therapists should know about this App! My daughter absolutely loves and interacts with this game.

reviews.title: WHY
reviews.comment: Such a beautiful game. But why it is only on internal? I can\'t seem to move it to my SD card. Too bad it\'s too huge to be left on my internal memory. Also it seems to crash a lot. Disappointing. Will change to 5 starts if this is fixed. HTC One V.
